We have sent another verification code
Your account balance is the amount of money left in your account after you have made a transaction such as sending money.
This is the amount of money that is available in your account, which you are free to spend any time.
This is the total amount of money you have in your account. This includes funds that are available to use and funds that can’t be used.
This is the amount you can’t access because it has been held by the bank. The bank will hold the funds for a specific time, for reasons such as an unpaid loan.
This is the amount that has not yet been deposited or taken from your account, it’s still being processed by the bank.
